item.title: My second script- american idol
item.dc:creator: @legolas5802 legolas5802
item.description:
@legolas5802 wrote:

well i made a american idol contestant generator

here it is

results wil lbe in debug box

[code]
program AIGenerate;
type
AmericanIdol = Record
Name , Last : Array[1…20] of String;
Genre, Response, Age : Array[1…10] of String;
Gender: Array[1…2] of String;
end;

var
Sync: AmericanIdol;
x: Integer;

procedure ArrayDeclare;
begin
sync.Name[1] := ‘Amy’;
sync.Name[2] := ‘Joe’;
sync.Name[3] := ‘Elliot’;
sync.Name[4] := ‘Samantha’;
sync.Name[5] := ‘Denny’;
sync.Name[6] := ‘James’;
sync.Name[7] := ‘Dillon’;
sync.Name[8] := ‘Jenifer’;
sync.Name[9] := ‘Dave’;
sync.Name[10] := ‘Alyssa’;
sync.Name[11] := ‘Denice’;

sync.Last[1] := ‘Renolds’;
sync.Last[2] := ‘Chong’;
sync.Last[3] := ‘Denozier’;
sync.Last[4] := ‘Finntie’;
sync.Last[5] := ‘Williams’;
sync.Last[6] := ‘Smith’;
sync.Last[7] := ‘Wilbern’;
sync.Last[8] := ‘Phelis’;
sync.Last[9] := ‘Hanalie’;
sync.Last[10] := ‘Sidavae’;
sync.Last[11] := ‘Hornel’;

sync.Genre[1] := ‘rock’;
sync.Genre[2] := ‘rap’;
sync.Genre[3] := ‘pop’;
sync.Genre[4] := ‘country’;

sync.Age[1] := ‘16’;
sync.Age[2] := ‘17’;
sync.Age[3] := ‘18’;
sync.Age[4] := ‘19’;
sync.Age[5] := ‘20’;
sync.Age[6] := ‘21’;
sync.Age[7] := ‘22’;
sync.Age[8] := ‘23’;
sync.Age[9] := ‘24’;
sync.Age[10] := ‘25’;

sync.Gender[1] := ‘Male’;
sync.Gender[2] := ‘Female’;

sync.Response[1] := ‘you suck’; //from Simon
sync.Response[2] := ‘I loved it’; //from Paula
sync.Response[3] := ’ Leme here it from the Dawgpound!’; //from Randy

end;

begin

 ClearDebug;
 ArrayDeclare;
 x:= Random(11)+1;
     begin
          Writeln('First Name : '+Sync.Name[x]);
     end;
 x:= Random(11)+1;
     begin
          Writeln('Last Name: '+Sync.Last[x]);
     end;
 x:= Random(2)+1;
     begin
          Writeln('Gender: '+Sync.Gender[x]);
     end;
 x:= Random(4)+1;
     begin
          Writeln('Music Genre: '+Sync.Genre[x]);
     end;
 x:= Random(10)+1;
     begin
          Writeln('Age: '+Sync.Age[x]);
     end;
 x:= Random(3)+1;
     begin
          Writeln('Response from Judges: '+Sync.Response[x]);
     end;

end.
[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2006, 01:13:53 PM[/size][hr]just to let you know, this is Wcer Auto from SRL forums
